statements: SELECT user_id, device_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, interaction_data FROM user_interactions;
SELECT device_id, user_id, interaction_data, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE device_id = '987e6543-b21a-47c8-afcd-882bfaaf4411';
SELECT interaction_timestamp, interaction_data FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
SELECT device_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE device_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;

SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8' AND device_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c9' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT interaction_timestamp, interaction_data FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND interaction_timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE maintenance_status = 'pending';
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_type, timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE maintenance_status = 'scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY interaction_type;

SELECT user_id, device_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions INNER JOIN PredictiveMaintenance ON UserInteractions.device_id = PredictiveMaintenance.device_id WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM user_interactions;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_location DESC;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE device_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT device_type, AVG(maintenance_cost) AS avg_cost FROM iot_devices JOIN predictive_maintenance ON iot_devices.device_id = predictive_maintenance.device_id GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT device_id, device_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM iot_devices JOIN predictive_maintenance USING (device_id) WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT device_name, location, firmware_version FROM DeviceInfo ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM BehavioralAnalysis WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 5000 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_duration FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_duration DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM DeviceInfo WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND firmware_version <> 'v1.0';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM BehavioralAnalysis WHERE user_id = 200 AND activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM PredictiveMaintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC, maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '730016f2-9054-4e3c-b0ea-8de9d963e4f7';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, location, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM device_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE device_id = 'c9d0d2a1-d7d4-4115-bdf4-2e74fa5dc2d7';
